Articles.Content:
Hi again my name is Karl and im here to show off my second release:

The ORBITR 1 yes it's silly but it works. So basically its a single stage

orbiter.

Facts:

SINGLE STAAAAAAAGE.

Mark 1 model ( I was gonna make a Mark 2 & 3 but it was no change in the fuel capacity. )

No parachutes, your kerbal astronauts will face a horrific landing

.16 Stock; No mods needed!

Budgetary?

Its also lag free even on my crappy Gtx420.

Kinda' good at manoeuvring in space without RCS.

1 ASAS unit.

Photo album: http://s1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb414/pikmin2faner/VAB%20Showoff/

DL link: http://www./?9oxv9qckggfvki5
